data: Unknown gunmen killed two people near Lokiliri county in Jubek state, as they were travelling from Magwi in Imatong State, to Juba.
SPLA/M-In Opposition: Sudanese Peoples Liberation Army/Movement-In Opposition
250 government soldiers defected to the armed oppposition led by Riek Machar in Mayom county, Unity State, accusing the government of tribalism and nepotism.
SPLA/M-In Opposition: Sudanese Peoples Liberation Army/Movement-In Opposition
Reported fighting between government and opposition near Yei town left 41 killed. Each side claimed victory and put the same number of fatalities on the other side.
name: South_Sudan_Recent_Conflict_Events.csv
